eventSummary: Blockstream has issued an alert regarding a new email phishing campaign targeting hardware wallet users. https://cointelegraph.com/news/blockstream-sounds-alarm-email-phishing-campaign

New ModStealer malware is exploiting fake job ads to target crypto wallets across Windows, Mac, and Linux operating systems. https://cryptonews.com/news/new-malware-exploits-fake-job-ads-to-hit-crypto-wallets-on-windows-mac-linux/
Researchers have uncovered undetectable malware that is draining crypto browser wallets. https://cryptopanic.com/news/25178053/Researchers-Uncover-Undetectable-Malware-Draining-Crypto-Browser-Wallets
Evoq Finance was drained for $390k on BSC due to a critical vulnerability. https://x.com/guardrailai/status/1966186162600685974?89277
A new Android banking trojan named RatOn is threatening U.S. banks. https://www.americanbanker.com/news/new-android-banking-trojan-raton-threatens-u-s-banks

A massive crypto supply chain attack has been reported, with Ledger CTO warning hardware wallet users to verify every transaction and others to avoid on-chain activity until patched. THORWallet has disabled swaps and sends as a precaution, and their webapp is password protected. Funds are reported safe as users own their keys. https://t.co/XfzeZYHIuJ

Bank hacks have doubled since 2023, impacting investor confidence. This highlights the need for financial custodians to prioritize cybersecurity as an investment in trust and growth. https://buff.ly/oQESTuf
